title: Cream of Gnocchi Soup
directions: In a large pot, first melt the butter on medium heat. Then add your onions, carrots, and celery. Sautee these for about 5 minutes.
After they’ve sauteed, add in the seasonings along with the all-purpose flour and mix well.
Next, pour your vegetable broth in the pot. Bring everything to a boil and then cover and simmer on low for about 30 minutes.
Once the 30 minutes have hit, uncover your pot, add in the gnocchi, and cook for 5 minutes.
Then, add the half & half, chopped spinach, and cream cheese!
Continue cooking for another 5 minutes until the cream cheese has melted completely.
